amendment.description: Amendment adds to the list of approved Clean Energy Corps activities the development of clean energy programs designed to meet the needs of rural communities.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-39 to add to the list of approved Clean Energy Corps activities the development of clean energy programs designed to meet the needs of rural communities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pingree (ME) amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 388 - 36 (Roll no. 133).
